```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
```

```{r}
eavs_2022 <- read_dta("2022_EAVS_for_Public_Release_V1_MEDSL.dta")
```

```{r}
cured_mail <- eavs_2022 %>% 
  filter(c7a > 0, c8a > 0) %>% 
  select(jurisdiction_name, state_abbr, c1b, c7a, c8a, c9a)
```

```{r}
cured_mail %>% 
  summarise(total = sum(c7a))
```
```{r}
write_csv(cured_mail, "cured_mail.csv")
```
